textAfterTable: Gloves Palm measurement should be taken around the fullest part of the hand not including the thumb.  If right handed, use right hand. Measure hand length on your palm side. Measure from first wrist fold to top of middle finger. Sizing information is provided by the manufacturer and does not guarantee a perfect fit.
